  • Why Exporra

  • Goals & Vision
  • Launch

Exporra

Simplify Compliance. Empower Trade.

What We Offer

  • Automated ECCN and HS Code Classification: Our AI assigns and verifies product classifications, saving you time and minimizing errors.
  • Continuous Monitoring: Stay updated on regulatory changes that might impact your products, ensuring your classifications are always accurate.
  • Risk-Free Screening: Conduct Know Your Customer (KYC) checks on clients and partners, detecting potential sanctions risks before they become a problem.
  • End-to-End Trade Compliance: Manage your compliance needs from one centralized platform—effortlessly.

Why Exporra?

  • Accuracy You Can Trust: Our AI doesn’t just automate—it double-checks and validates your classifications to ensure you meet international standards.
  • Risk Mitigation: Stay ahead of potential compliance issues with proactive monitoring and alerts.
  • Efficient Solutions: Streamline compliance, reduce costs, and save valuable time, all while protecting your reputation.
  • Peace of Mind: With Exporra, you can trust that your products are classified correctly and your processes are fully compliant.

About Us

    Driven by Excellence. United for a Safer World.
    At Exporra, we’re more than just a team. We’re a mission-driven family of expert programmers and experienced lawyers. Together, we’ve combined cutting-edge technology with deep regulatory expertise to create a platform that does more than streamline compliance.

Goals & Vision

  • Our goal is to help businesses:
    • Stay ahead of complex global regulations.
    • Save time, resources, and money.
    • Operate responsibly in an ever-changing world.
  • But our vision goes beyond business. We believe in being Warriors of Peace. Every line of code and every compliance solution we design is built to ensure that products stay out of the wrong hands. By empowering companies to follow international regulations, we contribute to a safer world—one where trade fosters growth, not conflict.
    Every day, we work to build a platform that safeguards your business while supporting global stability and peace.
    Because at Exporra, we’re not just solving problems; we’re creating solutions that matter.

Launch

The future of trade compliance is here. Exporra launches in July 2025, and we invite you to be part of this transformation.
Interested in simplifying your compliance and reducing risks?
Contact us at Info@exporra.com to learn more or secure early access to our platform.

Copyright © Exporra 2024
